text: Sara Luzita ( Jacobs, 11 August 1922 â€“ 14 February 2025) is a British dancer. She focuses in ballet and Spanish dancing. She performed with the Rambert Dance Company. She appeared in Moulin Rouge and Oh... Rosalinda!!. In 1954, she married Tutte Lemkow. They had two daughters, Rachel and Rebecca. Luzita turned 100 in August 2022, and died on 14 February 2025, at the age of 102. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1922 births Category:2025 deaths Category:British dancers Category:People from Staffordshire
title: Sara Luzita
